name: Storm Brand
description: Creates a magical brand which can attach to a nearby enemy. It periodically activates while attached, firing beams which deal damage to nearby enemies and those around them. The brand will detach if the enemy dies.
effects: Increases and Reductions to Cast Speed also apply to this Skill's Activation frequency
Can be Detached for a total Duration of 6.00 seconds
Can be Attached for a total Duration of 5.00 seconds
Sends beams to 3 Enemies, including the Branded Enemy
Deals (80-130)% more Damage with Hits against Branded Enemy
